sentence:
• Shares of Lowe's Companies, Inc. ( LOW ) increased 9.5% after posting fiscal fourth quarter adjusted earnings of $0.86 a share, surpassing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.79
• Best Buy Co., Inc's ( BBY ) shares declined 4.5% after reporting fiscal fourth-quarter revenues of $13,482 million, missing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $13,608 million
• Shares of salesforce.com, inc. ( CRM ) rose 3% after announcing fiscal fourth-quarter adjusted earnings of $0.02 per share, up from the year-ago figure of $0.01
• Veeva Systems Inc's ( VEEV ) shares increased 2.8% after posting fiscal fourth-quarter adjusted earnings of $0.15 per share, beating the Zacks Consensus Estimate by 4 cents
